Class User

java.lang.Object
application.User
public class User extends Object
The User class represents a user entity in the system. It contains the user's details such as userName, password, and role.

    • addTrustedReviewer

      public boolean addTrustedReviewer(int reviewerId)
      Add a reviewer id to this user's trusted reviewers list. This is kept in-memory for now; persistence can be added to DatabaseHelper later.
      Parameters:
      reviewerId - id of the reviewer to trust
      Returns:
      true if added, false if already present

    • removeTrustedReviewer

      public boolean removeTrustedReviewer(int reviewerId)
      Remove a reviewer id from the trusted list.
      Parameters:
      reviewerId - reviewer id to remove
      Returns:
      true if removed, false if not present

    • getTrustedReviewerIds

      public List<Integer> getTrustedReviewerIds()
      Return the list of trusted reviewer ids for this user.
      Returns:
      unmodifiable list of reviewer ids
